title: ERIGON STUCK AT SNAPSHOT [1/16]

stuck at:

"Sep 27 08:23:20 ip-10-1-3-78 erigon[302342]: [INFO] [09-27|08:23:20.990] [1/16 Snapshots] download progress="54.64% 234.2GB/428.7GB" download-time-left=999hrs:99m:99s total-download-time=8m20s download=0B/s upload=0B/s"

`download=0B/s upload=0B/s` you are not downloading anything
Check your internet availability. You can be blocked from connecting to new peers.
As you can see this number is way to low `download peers=2`

- restart erigon
- check that --torrent.port is open for TCP and UDP on firewall
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
